name: http_parser

formatHttpDate.name: formatHttpDate
formatHttpDate.comment:
Return a HTTP-formatted string representation of http_parser/http_parser.formatHttpDate.date.

This follows RFC 822 as updated by RFC 1123.

parseHttpDate.name: parseHttpDate
parseHttpDate.comment:
Parses an HTTP-formatted date into a UTC dart-core.DateTime.

This follows RFC 2616. It will throw a dart-core.FormatException if http_parser/http_parser.parseHttpDate.date is invalid.

class.name: CompatibleWebSocket
class.preview: An implementation of the WebSocket protocol that's not specific to "dart:io" or to any particular HTTP API.

class.name: MediaType
class.preview: A class representing an HTTP media type, as used in Accept and Content-Type headers.

packageIntro: http_parser is a platform-independent package for parsing and serializing various HTTP-related formats. It's designed to be usable on both the browser and the server, and thus avoids referencing any types from dart:io or dart:html.
